title: LAG spikes with Telstra internet provider
body: Is anyone experiencing lag spikes in LOL with Telstra NBN (in SA)?  Had a person in a game told me that he has the same issue! WHAT THE HECK!!!!

replies.body: Yeh telstra are doing maintenance, mine says is due to complete thursday 28th of this month -_-.. i have tried practice tool several times but still ping spikes </3 rip :/ been hell trying to climb this last week just hoping the next game would be better game after game
Are you in South Australia too?
Yes same here tried hex repair kit, uninstalling and reinstalling. Also forced repatch etc
Damn, is ur internet working ok now? I am still experiencing really bad lag spikes. And I think its Telstra's problem? Thank you for reply!
